plot: A twisted tale of two unemployed graduates who embark on a journey to make it in a world where you need more than what you have to get what you want.
title: A Sting in a Tale
plot_es: A twisted tale of two unemployed graduates who embark on a journey to make it in a world where you need more than what you have to get what you want.
plot_en: A twisted tale of two unemployed graduates who embark on a journey to make it in a world where you need more than what you have to get what you want.
